community.title: Community
community.subtitle: This project is still very young and built by one person. A small, kind community can help it grow 10× faster — through ideas, feedback, translations, bug reports, or just cheering from the sidelines.

connect.title: Where to find & join us
connect.twitter: Quick updates, polls, behind-the-scenes, and casual chats
connect.telegramDesc: Planned for real-time discussions — join waitlist if interested
connect.githubDesc: Feature requests, bug reports, ideas — best place for technical conversations
connect.emailDesc: Private questions, longer feedback, or if you prefer not to post publicly

values.title: What this community values
values.kind: Kindness and respect — no toxicity, gatekeeping or drama
values.honest: Honest feedback — even (especially) if it’s critical
values.help: Helping each other — experienced users helping newcomers
values.build: Building in public — sharing wins, fails, and lessons
values.ps: P.S. This is not a huge polished Discord with 10k members (yet). It’s small, personal, and human — just how I like it for now.

join.title: Want to be part of this early community?
join.subtitle: No pressure, no big commitment. Just show up, say hi, share an idea, report something annoying, or help someone else — every small action counts.
join.ps: Thank you in advance — even just reading this page and thinking “this guy is trying hard” already means a lot.
